text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Corrupt Donald Trump caused more than 120,000 Americans to die by downplaying the coronavirus pandemic and telling people that the cases would go down to zero by summer, asking people to take hydroxychloroquine despite fatal heart problems, and to inject bleach into their blood.
